titleStmt.title: Pliny's panegyricke: a speech in Senate: wherein publike thankes are presented to the Emperour Traian, / by C. Plinius CÃ¦cilius Secundus Consul of Rome. Translated out of the originall Latin, illustrated with annotations, and dedicated to the prince, by Sr Rob. Stapylton Knight, Gent. in Ordinary of the Privy Chamber to His Highnesse.
Panegyricus. English
titleStmt.author: Pliny, the Younger.
Stapylton, Robert, Sir, d. 1669.

notesStmt.note: Wing has publication year 1644[5]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1645.
The frontispiece portrait of Charles II as a young man in the Thomason copy "is only one of a set of similar oval plates used for illustrating books"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
